prompt:
Use case: chapter 1 cinematic beat
Primary request: A fragile valuation monolith cracks and upper metric plates sink as confidence fades
Scene/background: financial plinth under soft spotlight
Subject: single porcelain metric tower with subtle fracture lines
Action: hairline cracks spread, top plates slide down in controlled slow motion
Camera: low angle, slight tilt up, static frame
Lighting/mood: soft top-left key with muted teal glow at crack seams
Color palette: cream white, muted teal, deep navy
Style/format: premium minimal bas-relief cinematic render
Timing/beats: beat 1 stable tower, beat 2 fracture, beat 3 controlled drop
Constraints: clean metaphor only, no brand references, no ticker text
Avoid: explosive destruction, red-green trading screens, camera shake
